title: Hazor-Hadattah
content:
HAZOR-HADATTAH

One of the cities located in the southern extremity of Judah, near the border of Edom (Jos 15:25). The kjv translates the term as two different cities, “Hazor and Hadattah.” The Aramaic adjective “Hadattah” indicates this as a settlement from Hazor, but this is unsure.
